Package camzup.core

Class KnotAnim

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.KnotAnim
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<KnotAnim>
public class KnotAnim
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<KnotAnim>
Organizes the quaternions that shape a Bezier curve on the surface of a sphere into a sphere coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Quaternion coord
    The orientation of the knot, serving as a coordinate on a sphere.
    Quaternion foreHandle
    The handle which warps the curve segment heading away from the knot along the direction of the curve.
    Quaternion rearHandle
    The handle which warps the curve segment heading towards the knot along the direction of the curve.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    KnotAnim()
    The default constructor.
    KnotAnim​(float wco, float xco, float yco, float zco, float wfh, float xfh, float yfh, float zfh, float wrh, float xrh, float yrh, float zrh)
    Sets this knot from a series of floats.
    KnotAnim​(KnotAnim source)
    Creates a new knot from a source.
    KnotAnim​(Quaternion coord, Quaternion foreHandle, Quaternion rearHandle)
    Creates a knot from a series of quaternions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int compareTo​(KnotAnim knot)
    Compares this knot to another based on a comparison between coordinates.
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
    Tests to see if this knot equals an object
    int hashCode()
    Returns the knot's hash code based on those of its three constituent vectors.
    KnotAnim mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    KnotAnim mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    KnotAnim mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    KnotAnim reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    KnotAnim rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates a knot around the x axis.
    KnotAnim rotateX​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot around the x axis.
    KnotAnim rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the y axis.
    KnotAnim rotateY​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot around the y axis.
    KnotAnim rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates a knot around the z axis.
    KnotAnim rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis.
    KnotAnim set​(float wco, float xco, float yco, float zco, float wfh, float xfh, float yfh, float zfh, float wrh, float xrh, float yrh, float zrh)
    Sets this knot from a series of floats.
    KnotAnim set​(KnotAnim source)
    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    KnotAnim set​(Quaternion coord, Quaternion foreHandle, Quaternion rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of quaternions.
    static Quaternion squad​(KnotAnim a, KnotAnim b, float step, Quaternion target)
    Returns a rotation (or a coordinate on the surface of a sphere), given two knots and a step.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    getClass, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Sets this knot from a series of floats.

      wco - the coordinate w
      xco - the coordinate x
      yco - the coordinate y
      zco - the coordinate z

      yfh - the fore handle y
      zfh - the fore handle z
      wrh - the rear handle w
      xrh - the rear handle x
      yrh - the rear handle y
      zrh - the rear handle z

      public KnotAnim mirrorHandles()
      Mirrors this knot's handles. Defaults to mirroring in the forward direction.
      Returns:
      this knot
      See Also:
      mirrorHandlesForward()

    • mirrorHandlesBackward

      public KnotAnim mirrorHandlesBackward()
      Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
      Returns:
      this knot

    • mirrorHandlesForward

      public KnotAnim mirrorHandlesForward()
      Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
      Returns:
      this knot

    • reverse

      public KnotAnim reverse()
      Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
      Returns:
      this knot

    • rotateX

      public KnotAnim rotateX​(float cosa, float sina)
      Rotates this knot around the x axis. Accepts calculated sine and cosine of half the angle, so that collections of knots can be efficiently rotated without repeatedly calling cos and sin.
      Parameters:
      cosa - cosine of half the angle
      sina - sine of half the angle
      Returns:
      this knot
      See Also:
      Quaternion.rotateX(Quaternion, float, float, Quaternion)

    • squad

      public static Quaternion squad​(KnotAnim a, KnotAnim b, float step, Quaternion target)
      Returns a rotation (or a coordinate on the surface of a sphere), given two knots and a step.
      Parameters:
      a - the origin knot
      b - the destination knot
      step - the step
      target - the orientation
      Returns:
